TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DashStyles extends System.Object
public ref class DashStyles abstract sealed

summary.span: 实现一组预定义的 对象。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示不同的短划线样式应用于下划线的示例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![显示几种不同的短划线样式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "显示几种不同的短划线样式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能声明此托管的类中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但你可以使用其静态属性将中的值分配[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.DashStyle Dash { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Media.DashStyle Dash
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Dash As DashStyle
public: static property System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ Dash { System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 属性等于 2,2 的 。

span.span: Gets a with a property equal to 2, 2.

value.span: 2,2 的虚线序列，描述由长度为钢笔 两倍的虚线后跟长度为 两倍的空格构成的一个序列。

span.span: A dash sequence of 2,2, which describes a sequence composed of a dash that is twice as long as the pen followed by a space that is twice as long as the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示不同的短划线样式应用于下划线的示例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![显示几种不同的短划线样式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "显示几种不同的短划线样式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dash`}"/><*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dash`}"/>

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示不同的短划线样式应用于下划线的示例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![显示几种不同的短划线样式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "显示几种不同的短划线样式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dot`}"/><*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dot`}"/>

public: static property System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ Solid { System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a with an empty property.
A dash sequence with no dashes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性生成一条实线，等效于未定义的短划线序列。This property produces a solid line and is equivalent to not defining a dash sequence. 下图显示不同的短划线样式应用于下划线的示例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![显示几种不同的短划线样式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "显示几种不同的短划线样式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Solid`}"/><*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Solid`}"/>
